acceptance_criteria: FO-01 appears in sidebar, Demo/Info tabs work
closed_reason: Added FO-01 to nav.config.ts with Demo/Info children routes. Created layout.tsx and fo-01-layout-client.tsx following the same pattern as alt-process-1 and full-process layouts (server layout wrapping client layout with TopSubmenu).
description:
Add FO-01 to nav.config.ts following existing pattern.

Add entry:
{
  label: 'FO-01',
  path: '/fo-01',
  children: [
    { label: 'Demo', path: '/fo-01' },
    { label: 'Info', path: '/fo-01/info' },
  ],
}

Create layout file: app/fo-01/layout.tsx
- Import TopSubmenu
- Use navTree to get FO-01 submenu items
- Follow pattern from other agent layouts (e.g., app/full-process/layout.tsx)

Task completed successfully. I:

   - Label: "FO-01"
   - Path: "/fo-01" 
   - Children: Demo (/fo-01) and Info (/fo-01/info)

2. **Created app/fo-01/layout.tsx** - Server component wrapper that imports and renders the client layout

3. **Created app/fo-01/fo-01-layout-client.tsx** - Client component with:
   - 'use client' directive
   - TopSubmenu using navTree to get children/actions
   - Same pattern as alt-process-1 and full-process layouts

4. **Verified** with lint and build - both passed

5. **Committed** with task ID [oqx] and left an epic note for future iterations

title: Add FO-01 to navigation
